item.title: collaborative video workshop at Insomnia Festival 2021
You Don't Know Me
item.description:
video, 01:07

An attempt to confront the outer world with all the faces my inner world can put on while exclaiming the words â€œYou Donâ€™t Know Meâ€ over and over again with varying stress on each word. The rhythm of the video was inspired while exploring the works of Gary Hill.

This work was exhibited at Galerie MÄ›sta Pardubice (8th to 10th June 2018) as part of a group exhibition titled â€œI dropped my phone yesterdayâ€.
